text: Ara tini ya srsti karechena ta theke allah tomadera jan'ya baniyechena chaya, ara paharera madhye tomadera jan'ya tini baniyechena asrayasthala, ara tomadera jan'ya tini byabastha karechena posaka ya tomadera raksa kare garama theke, ara barma ya tomadera raksa kare tomadera yud'dhabigrahe. E'ibhabe tini tomadera prati tamra anugraha paripurna karechena yena tomara aâ€Œtmasamarpana karo.
